Sentencas: A novel design for a three-dimensional (3-D) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) along with its method of fabrication is reported.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This structure utilizes two 3-D channels that are separated by unique anode/electrolyte/cathodc walls that thereby increases the active volumetric surface areas of the electrodes used for the chemical reactions.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To implement this structure, a graphite template having one 3-D interconnected channel is successively coated with anode (NiO-YSZ), electrolyte (YSZ), and cathode (LSM-YSZ) slurries, followed by heat-treatment at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This produces an additional 3-D channel that has the NiO-YSZ layer as a replica of the graphite template, while preserving the pre-existing channel that has the LSM-YSZ layer.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thickness of the NiO-YSZ layer, which provides mechanical stability, is controlled by adjusting the number of dip-coating cycles.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using this approach, it is possible to fabricate a similar to 10 mm cubic SOFC without any notable defects, as well as to control the microstructures of the NiO-YSZ/-YSZILSM-YSZ walls.
Titulo: Design and fabrication of three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cells
